name: Tawhaki
description:
An adventure game prototype based on the Maori myths of Tawhaki. Tawhaki is a Polynesian trickster and tohunga (priest) who went on many adventures. In this game, Tawhaki travels to a distant island, marries (twice), and gets into all sorts of trouble.

This is my first game, so it's a little buggy. It was made with Unity and Adventure Creator.
